name: Blood-Tinted Amulet
description: A small copper amulet filled with dried blood. Grants +1 to defense against minor supernatural attacks once per scene.

mechanics.roll: Occult roll (Difficulty 2) to focus protective energy
mechanics.side_effects: Mild dizziness if used more than once in 24 hours
mechanics.detection: Emits faint metallic ringing detectable by sensitive supernatural senses

name: Cactus Thorn Dagger
description: A thin dagger tipped with a preserved desert cactus thorn, lightly enchanted to cause extra discomfort. +1 to intimidation checks when used.

mechanics.single_use: Thorn loses enchantment after one lethal hit

name: Desert Sand Pouch
description: A small cloth pouch of sand from a sacred desert site. When spread, highlights recent foot or hand prints and faint magical traces.

mechanics.limited_use: Twice per scene before needing recharge
mechanics.optional: Occult roll (Difficulty 3) to track magical signatures

name: Silver Mirror Shard
description: A broken shard from a ceremonial silver mirror. Can reveal illusions or disguised creatures when held up to the eye.

mechanics.activation: Hold up to eye, takes 10 seconds
mechanics.risk: Reflects minor harmful spells back to holder on failed roll
mechanics.detection: Emits faint glimmer detectable by other magics

name: Vial of Desert Night
description: A tiny vial of dark liquid that dims shadows around the user. +1 to Stealth rolls at night.

mechanics.side_effects: Minor dizziness (Mental roll Difficulty 1 to ignore)
mechanics.detection: Faint dark shimmer; Perception + Mental (Difficulty 3) to notice

name: Burned Tarot Card
description: A scorched card from an old tarot deck. Provides +1 bonus to mental rolls seeking insight about the future.

mechanics.detection: Burned scent detectable by sensitive NPCs

name: Ashes of the Fallen
description: A small vial of ashes from a ritual pyre. Enhances Blood Magic or minor rituals, adding +1 to Occult tests.

mechanics.risk: Toxic if inhaled (Physical roll Difficulty 2 to resist injury)

name: Cracked Obsidian Coin
description: A small coin etched with runes. Grants temporary sway in minor negotiations (+1 Social) once per encounter.

mechanics.detection: Coin emits faint magical aura detectable by Occult rolls (Difficulty 3)

name: Charred Bone Charm
description: A small bone burned in a protective ritual. +1 to defense against one supernatural effect per scene.

name: Vine-Wrapped Staff
description: Short wooden staff wrapped with thorny vines. Grants +1 to Occult or Brawl challenges when performing a ritual or intimidating enemies.

mechanics.side_effects: Thorns may injure user if misused

name: Moonlit Candle
description: White candle infused with moonlit oil. Enhances meditation and minor spellcasting, granting +1 Mental rolls during rituals.

mechanics.side_effects: Extinguishes in wind; must be re-lit for reuse

name: Chalk Sigil Set
description: Colored chalks for drawing protective or binding sigils. Provides +1 to Security or Occult checks when properly applied.

mechanics.optional: Security roll (Difficulty 2) for trap or ward effectiveness

name: Rusted Iron Necklace
description: Old iron necklace imbued with warding rituals. Protects wearer from minor curses (+1 Occult defense).

mechanics.risk: Loses effect if wet or exposed to water

name: Smoked Glass Vial
description: Contains rare desert herbs and crushed minerals. Can brew potions granting temporary bonuses to Stealth or Investigation.

mechanics.side_effects: Failed roll may cause mild dizziness or nausea

name: Sigil Tattoo Kit
description: Temporary tattoo ink and stencils. Tattoos grant minor bonuses (+1) to a single Attribute or Ability for 24 hours.

mechanics.side_effects: Misapplication may cause skin irritation (-1 Physical)

name: Nightshade Oil
description: A dark oil extracted from toxic plants. Can coat a blade or surface; causes 1 lethal damage if successfully applied. The oil is potent but delicate, requiring careful handling to avoid accidental exposure.

mechanics.application_time: 1 minute to coat weapon or surface
mechanics.resistance: Target may roll Physical or Resistance (Difficulty 2) to reduce damage by 1 level
mechanics.detection: Faint bitter odor; Perception roll (Difficulty 3) to notice
mechanics.handling: Occult roll (Difficulty 2) to safely apply; failure causes minor injury (1 bashing)
mechanics.single_use: Oil loses potency after one attack or 1 hour

name: Katana
description: A finely forged Japanese katana. Lightweight and razor-sharp, ideal for skilled combatants.

mechanics.parry_bonus: +1 to defense if using appropriate martial stance
mechanics.risk: Requires proper training; unskilled use may cause self-injury (1 bashing)
mechanics.durability: Can withstand 10 combat uses before dulling; requires maintenance to keep sharp

name: Moonstone Charm
description: A small moonstone carved into a crescent. Glows faintly in darkness and can reveal hidden magical auras.

mechanics.activation: Hold or wear; glow activates instantly in darkness
mechanics.roll: Occult + Mental (Difficulty 2) to detect magical auras within 10 feet
mechanics.side_effects: Minor eye strain if used repeatedly in dark scenes

name: Silver Oak Leaf Pendant
description: A pendant shaped like an oak leaf, made of silver. Provides minor protection against supernatural attacks and can slightly influence nature spirits.

mechanics.activation: Worn around neck; protection is passive
mechanics.roll: Occult + Mental (Difficulty 2) to influence minor nature spirits
mechanics.use_limit: Protection +1 once per scene; spirit influence once per scene
mechanics.side_effects: Wearing in polluted or urban environments reduces effectiveness (-1 to rolls)
mechanics.duration: Effects last one scene per activation
